Text: hey genius, I'm not saying that your torrent isn't good [it might or might not be, I'm too lazy to check] but next time instead of making a torrent link to download a .torrent file to download your file[s], just post a torrent link direct to your files. A benefit of this is that the actual file size of the game will display instead of 70.9 kb [the size of your torrent link. Just a thought.
